A

addTransaction(String, double, String, String, LocalDate, String) - Static method in class FinanceTrackerSystem.Controllers.TransactionController
Adds a new transaction for the current user, updates the relevant account balance, and recalculates budget progress.

C

calculateBudgetProgressByTransactions() - Static method in class FinanceTrackerSystem.Controllers.BudgetController
Calculates the progress of each budget by summing the amounts of transactions that match the budget's category and fall within the budget's date range.
